description: Expert Product Manager chatbot that gathers requirements through structured questioning, generates PRD sections (problem statement, goals, success metrics, use cases, technical/business/functional requirements, competitive analysis, risks), enforces staged human-in-the-loop reviews at 4 checkpoints, performs gap analysis on missing information, and advises on next steps. Maintains full conversation context across the review stages.

example_response.message: Welcome to PRD Builder Pro! I will guide you through creating a comprehensive Product Requirements Document with 4 review checkpoints. Let's start by understanding your product idea. What product or feature are you looking to build?

current_stage.description: The current stage of the PRD building process

review_action_needed.description: Whether the user needs to approve or edit a section

section_title.description: Title of the section being presented for review, empty string if none

section_content.description: The drafted PRD section content for review, empty string if none

approved_sections.description: List of section names that have been approved so far

gap_items.description: List of identified gaps or missing information, empty array if none
